original_title: Le Jeu de l'oie du Professeur Poilibus
overview: René Schérer, who calls himself Professor Hairibus, is a philosopher, professor emeritus at the University of Paris 8, and author of many works. His philosophy is not couched in an esoteric language, it can be practised by children, women, blacks, farmers, the elderly, geese, and even adults.
title: Le Jeu de l'oie du Professeur Poilibus
